definition: to talk in an informal and friendly way with somebody, especially in order to gain an advantage by persuading people to like you and do what you want
a poisonous plant used to make drugs, especially ones to make people sleep, thought in the past to have magic powers
a strong plastic that can bend easily, used for covering walls, floors and furniture, and for making book covers and, especially in the past, records
records made of vinyl, in contrast to CDs
in which there is a good result for each person or group involved
the bone that forms the lower jaw
a phone, usually in a public place, that is operated using coins or a card
the activity of an organization that provides a service or advice to people in the community, especially those who cannot or are unlikely to come to an office, a hospital, etc. for help
to make somebody/something beautiful or more beautiful
to try to make something pretty, often with the result that it looks worse or false
a glass for drinking out of, with a flat bottom and no handle or stem
the amount held by a tumbler
an acrobat who performs somersaults (= a jump in which you turn over completely in the air)
in a way that is connected with a doctrine or doctrines
a bush that has small bright yellow flowers in the early spring
in the form of a symphony; connected with symphonies
something that seems like a big mouth that swallows something up completely
an animal’s stomach or throat
a structure of cells with six sides, made by bees for holding their honey and their eggs
a book made with large sheets of paper, especially as used in early printing
a single sheet of paper from a book
a size of page made by folding a standard sheet of paper twice to make eight pages
a book with pages in quarto size
a size of a book page that is made by folding each sheet of paper into eight leaves (= 16 pages)
the people and activities involved in crime in a particular place
the place under the earth where people are believed to go when they die
used to describe something that you are sorry about and wish had not happened
unfortunately; as a result of bad luck
a shelf above a fireplace
in a way that means you cannot get something back
in a way that means you can never make something right or get it back
in a way that is too bad or too serious to repair or put right
covered in blood
involving a lot of blood or violence; showing or describing blood and violence
covered with blood
a small sea fish that swims in a vertical position and has a head that looks like the head of a horse
either of the two areas of the brain thought to be the centre of emotion and memory
large in amount, or impressive, and usually costing a lot of money
giving or doing something generously
extremely generous
giving too much of something
produced in large amounts
too willing to spend money or waste time, energy or materials
a person who leaves home and wastes their money and time on a life of pleasure, but who later is sorry about this and returns home
in a way that is fashionable and attractive
a small round cake, made with egg white, sugar and almonds, usually consisting of two halves with a cream filling in between
